items.name: Sword of Truth
items.description: A mythical sword that shines with the truth.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A potion that restores 50 health points.

items.name: Golden Shield
items.description: A shiny golden shield with superior defense capabilities.

items.name: Mysterious Map
items.description: An old map that leads to unknown treasures.

items.name: Bow of the Hunter
items.description: A long-range bow favored by skilled hunters.

items.name: Mana Elixir
items.description: Elixir that replenishes mana reserves.

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Lightweight armor made of reinforced leather.

items.name: Magic Scroll
items.description: A scroll with cryptic runes. Its purpose is a mystery.

items.name: Dwarven Axe
items.description: A heavy axe crafted by dwarven blacksmiths.

items.name: Cloak of Stealth
items.description: A cloak that makes the wearer less noticeable.

items.name: Ruby Amulet
items.description: An amulet with a radiant ruby. Boosts wearer's vitality.

items.name: Emerald Ring
items.description: A ring with a precious emerald. Amplifies magic.

items.name: Silver Dagger
items.description: A dagger made of pure silver, effective against werewolves.

items.name: Steel Boots
items.description: Boots made of hardened steel, offering protection to the wearer's feet.

items.name: Mystical Orb
items.description: A glowing orb with untapped powers.

items.name: Staff of Wisdom
items.description: A staff that bestows wisdom upon its wielder.

items.name: Platinum Crown
items.description: A crown symbolizing authority and power.

items.name: Tome of Knowledge
items.description: A heavy tome filled with ancient spells and lore.

items.name: Belt of Strength
items.description: A belt that grants added strength to the wearer.

items.name: Quiver of Endless Arrows
items.description: A quiver that never runs out of arrows.

items.name: Lantern of Guidance
items.description: A lantern that lights up the darkest of paths.

items.name: Potion of Giant Strength
items.description: Grants the drinker immense strength for a short period.

items.name: Dragonbone Bow
items.description: A powerful bow crafted from the bones of a dragon.

items.name: Crystal Ball
items.description: A mystical ball used for scrying and seeing distant places.

items.name: Mage's Robe
items.description: A robe that offers protection against magical attacks.

items.name: Boots of Swiftness
items.description: Grants the wearer increased movement speed.

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: A rare feather said to have rejuvenating powers.

items.name: Warhammer of Thunder
items.description: A hammer that roars with the fury of a thunderstorm.

items.name: Shield of Reflection
items.description: A shield that can reflect spells back to the caster.

items.name: Sapphire Earring
items.description: An earring imbued with the power of a sapphire gem.

items.name: Potion of Invisibility
items.description: Grants the drinker invisibility for a minute.

items.name: Oaken Staff
items.description: A staff carved from ancient oak trees.

items.name: Mask of Disguise
items.description: Allows the wearer to assume the appearance of another.

items.name: Golden Apple
items.description: A mythical apple that restores a large amount of health.

items.name: Iron Gauntlets
items.description: Protective handwear made of solid iron.

items.name: Emerald Scepter
items.description: A scepter adorned with a large emerald.

items.name: Parchment of Peace
items.description: A treaty written on ancient parchment.

items.name: Necklace of Fortitude
items.description: Boosts the wearer's vitality and endurance.

items.name: Horn of Awakening
items.description: A horn that can awaken and rally allies.

items.name: Bottled Ghost
items.description: A mischievous ghost trapped in a bottle.
